L

LevelController - Class in com.tk.wightwhale.levels
Singleton which manages the information associated with each level and GameSegment for display
LevelController() - Constructor for class com.tk.wightwhale.levels.LevelController
Default constructor Sets levelCount to 20
LevelController(int) - Constructor for class com.tk.wightwhale.levels.LevelController
Custom constructor with specified size
LevelMap - Class in com.tk.wightwhale.levels
 
LevelMap() - Constructor for class com.tk.wightwhale.levels.LevelMap
Default constructor Sets max width + height as 0, position as 0,0 and levelId as the default
LevelMap(int, int, String) - Constructor for class com.tk.wightwhale.levels.LevelMap
Custom constructor
levels - Variable in class com.tk.wightwhale.levels.LevelController
Level storage array
loadFromXML(File, int) - Method in class com.tk.wightwhale.levels.LevelController
Loads a singular LevelMap XML exported file
loadImageFile(Boolean) - Method in class com.tk.wightwhale.actors.GameObject
Loads image from the file already stored in imgFilename
loadImageFrom(File, Boolean) - Method in class com.tk.wightwhale.actors.GameObject
Loads image to use from a specified file
loadLevelImages() - Method in class com.tk.wightwhale.graphics.GraphicsController
Loads all images for the current area to memory By default, this will let you specify the size for Static Items, but it will match moving + controlled items to the png size.
Log - Class in com.tk.wightwhale.utils
 
Log() - Constructor for class com.tk.wightwhale.utils.Log
 
Log.type - Enum in com.tk.wightwhale.utils
This specifies the output format for the logs
